raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
is_client_response = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (out : raft_output) => match out with | NotLeader _ _ => false | ClientResponse c i o' => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) && (if output_eq_dec o o' then true else false) end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output -> bool Arguments is_client_response {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> log st' = log st

```coq
unfold output_correct_invariant.

intros.
induction H.

(* Case: in_output_trace client id out [(h, inr l)] *)
assert (H2: in_output_list client id out l).
{
  apply in_output_trace_singleton_inv in H.
  assumption.
}

(* Case: ~ in_output_trace client id out tr *)
assert (H3: ~ in_output_trace client id out tr).
{
  apply in_output_trace_not_nil in H.
  assumption.
}

(* Apply in_output_list_split *)
apply in_output_list_split with (l1 := []) (l2 := l).

(* Case: in_output_list client id out [] *)
left.
apply in_output_list_empty.

(* Case: in_output_list client id out l1 *)
right.
apply IHin_output_trace.

(* Case: in_output_list client id out l2 *)
{
  apply IHin_output_trace.

  (* Case: in_output_list client id out l1 *)
  left.
  apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2).

  (* Case: in_output_list client id out l2 *)
  right.
  apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2).
}

(* Apply in_output_list_dec *)
apply in_output_list_dec.

(* Case: in_output_list client id out tr *)
left.
apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2).

(* Case: ~ in_output_list client id out tr *)
right.
apply IHin_output_trace.

(* Case: in_output_list client id out l1 *)
left.
apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2).

(* Case: in_output_list client id out l2 *)
right.
apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2).
Qed.
```

original: unfold output_correct_invariant. intros. induction H. assert (H2: in_output_list client id out l). { apply in_output_trace_singleton_inv in H. auto. } assert (H3: ~ in_output_trace client id out tr). { apply in_output_trace_not_nil in H. auto. } apply in_output_list_split with (l1 := []) (l2 := l). left. apply in_output_list_empty. right. apply IHin_output_trace. { apply IHin_output_trace. left. apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2). right. apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2). } apply in_output_list_dec. left. apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2). right. apply IHin_output_trace. left. apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2). right. apply in_output_list_app_or with (c := client) (i := id) (o := out) (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2).
